casebody.data:
TILLMAN
v.
COMMERCIAL CREDIT. No. 360A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. John Alan Jones, G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Tillman and Richardson. Jeffrey M. Young, Research Triangle Park, Richard H. Sinkfield, Atlanta, GA, for Commercial Credit, et al. Carlene McNulty, Mallam J. Maynard, F. Paul Bland, Washington, DC, for NC Justice Center, et al. Matthew F. Sawchak, Wendy I. Sexton, Raleigh, Alan S. Kaplinsky, Jeremy T. Rosenblum, Philadelphia, PA, Robert E. McKew, General Counsel and SVP, Washington, DC, for American Financial Ser., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of November 2006 by Defendant to Admit Christopher J. Willis Pro Hac Vice:

*61"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
